title: [Silken Mist, Ballroom]
description: The ballroom is nothing less than glorious and no expense has been spared in the construction of this elegant chamber.  The room is illuminated by three elaborate chandeliers, each softly glowing with candlelight.  Several tables covered with crisp, ivory linens are bordering a sizeable parquet dance floor.
room.location: Silken Mist on Four Winds Isle
